title: ‘It’s Uncertain Where He Stands’: Vingegaard Racing the Tour de France Is the Risk That Has to Be Taken
content:
Nobody knows what version of Vingegaard will show up to the Tour, but Visma-Lease a Bike has no option but to take him: 'We're going with a different mindset.'

Read the full article at ‘It’s Uncertain Where He Stands’: Vingegaard Racing the Tour de France Is the Risk That Has to Be Taken on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
